channel.title: bayes on Doug Johnson's website
channel.description: Recent content in bayes on Doug Johnson's website

item.title: Test post
item.description: This is a test post using R markdown. \[ \sigma^2 = \sum x \] ggplot(diamonds, aes(carat, price)) + geom_point() Testing a tweet snippet. Indonesia has shifted its anti-poverty strategy, gradually moving from subsidising basic commodities to targeted assistance programs for the poor. Today's blog shares key learnings from randomised evaluations on the impact of anti-poverty programs. https://t.co/2FLnKF7IUo — devpolicy.org (@devpolicy) April 21, 2020
